General.Name: OIL&GAS REGS
General.Description: Oil and Gas Development Company Limited explores for, develops, produces, and sells oil and gas in Pakistan. The company produces crude oil, gas, liquefied petroleum gas, and sulphur. Oil and Gas Development Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Islamabad, Pakistan.
